code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{createQuery}from"../services/query";import styles from"./styles/queryForm.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactusForm=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[message,setmessage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async p=>{p.preventDefault();let res=await createQuery({email,message});if(res){setEmail("");setmessage("");}};const handleEmailChange=p=>{setEmail(p.target.value);};const handleMessageChange=p=>{setmessage(p.target.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{target:"_self",onSubmit:handleSubmit,action:"",autoComplete:"off",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"form-control","aria-describedby":"emailHelp",placeholder:"Enter your email ID here...",onChange:handleEmailChange,value:email,required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{type:"textarea",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter message here...",style:{minHeight:"80px"},onChange:handleMessageChange,value:message,required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"submit",className:`btn btn-success p-2 ${styles.button}`,children:["Send ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-paper-plane"})]})]})});};export default ContactusForm;
